_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
an8.8:3.3+an8.8:13.7^where_else_mentione: Saṅkheyyaka Mountain, Rājagaha, the Vulture’s Peak Mountain
an8.8:3.3+an8.8:13.7^who_else_mentioned: Uttara, Sakka, the Blessed One, Buddha, Devadatta, Mendicants
before^an8.8:3.3^where: Saṅkheyyaka Mountain in the Mahisa region near Dhavajālikā
where: Saṅkheyyaka Mountain in the Mahisa region near Dhavajālikā
